Blog posts

On this website, I write post IndieWeb post types. Some are longform, and others are short blurbs, likes, and replies to other websites. Below you'll find the archive for longform content, or articles. If you're looking for shortform things, check my Micro page.

Okay good talk. Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She has a keen interest in (digital) humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking.
